Keywords: Mystical , Scientist , Soldier , X-Factor , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Unknown
Team Up
01
TEAM UP: HAVOK, POLARIS, MADROX, STRONG GUY, WOLFSBANE, QUICKSILVER, MYSTIQUE, SHARD, SABRETOOTH: If 2+ listed friendly characters are on the map, Forge and listed friendly characters can use Empower. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
02
TEAM UP: STORM: If both Forge and the listed friendly character are on the map, they can use Enhancement but only to modify one another. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
Special Powers
THE MUTANT C.I.A.: Stealth. Improved Movement: Hindering. Improved Targeting: Hindering.
TECHNOPATH: Perplex. When Forge uses it to target another character that shares 2+ keywords, he may modify the chosen value except damage by +2 instead.
Trade Forge Want Forge

August 19, 2021
Kragnorak
Dan Aykroyd's conehead character hulks out and then cosplays as Forge. Plus he seems to be from the Critical Mass Corsair school of paintjobs. What happened here?
February 19, 2021
doctorone
Horrible sculpture, but good, lateral step and penetrating beam, with perplex plus 2 depending on the case, not to mention mutant cia, it seems good to me
January 9, 2021
Cyke82
If you were looking for an example of the new dynamic WizKids sculpts, Forge isn’t going to do it for you. I’ve seen chess pieces look more exciting. Still, I like what you get here for 60 points. The Mutant CIA is such a good trait in this set, and Forge has a decent assortment of keywords to be able to pull off that +2 Perplex. The 11 attack 3 damage Penetrating Psychic Blast make him a solid secondary attacker if needed, too. I played him in a BR where that 18 defense down the dial held up even against a damaged Juggernaut. Solid team up cards as well.
November 4, 2020
GL_Alex
He's going to be on a lot of my X-Force/X-Men/Scientist teams.
